question: What is the Exercise Price of the Option Awards granted to Vaibhav Taneja on October 31, 2024?
ground_truth: The Exercise Price of the Option Awards granted to Vaibhav Taneja on October 31, 2024, is $249.85.

question: Compare the related person transaction expenses incurred by Tesla with xAI and SpaceX in 2024. Which company had the higher amount, and by how much?
ground_truth: xAI had the higher transaction amount. In 2024, expenses incurred with xAI were approximately $198.3 million, while expenses with SpaceX were approximately $2.4 million. xAI was higher than SpaceX by approximately $195.9 million.
ground_truth_context: Page 28: SpaceX is party to certain commercial, licensing and support agreements with Tesla. Under these agreements, SpaceX incurred expenses of approximately $2.4 million in 2024.
Page 29: xAI is party to certain commercial... agreements with Tesla. Under these agreements, xAI incurred expenses of approximately $198.3 million in 2024.

question: Comparing directors Kimbal Musk and Ira Ehrenpreis, who beneficially owned more Tesla shares (including options exercisable within 60 days) as of December 31, 2024? What was the specific amount?
ground_truth: Kimbal Musk owned more. As of December 31, 2024, Kimbal Musk beneficially owned 1,864,970 shares, while Ira Ehrenpreis owned 1,681,005 shares.
ground_truth_context: Page 27, Beneficial Ownership Table: Ira Ehrenpreis shares: 1,681,005
Page 27, Beneficial Ownership Table: Kimbal Musk shares: 1,864,970

question: List all specific accomplishments achieved by Tesla for the full year 2024, including specific growth data for energy storage.
ground_truth: Accomplishments in 2024 include: 1. Model Y was the best-selling vehicle, of any kind, globally; 2. Reached lowest average cost of goods per vehicle ever at less than $35,000; 3. Energy storage reached 31.4 GWh, representing an increase of 113.3%, and completed construction of Megafactory Shanghai; 4. Improved FSD capabilities and increased AI training compute by over 400%; 5. Introduced the Cybercab.
ground_truth_context: Page 9: Model Y was the best-selling vehicle, of any kind, globally for the full year 2024;
Page 9: Reached lowest average cost of goods per vehicle ever at less than $35,000;
Page 9: 31.4 gigawatt hours of energy storage, representing an increase of 113.3%, compared to the prior year...
Page 10: Further improvements and deployment of our FSD... AI training compute by over 400% in 2024...
